title: 1826 W. Patterson Unit 1
map_address: 1826 West Patterson Ave near Lincoln Ave
posting_body: This four bedroom, four bathroom duplex apartment features a traditional decorative fireplace and a new, masterfully constructed wood staircase leading to the lower level of the unit.
The kitchen will soon have a brand new grey shaker cabinets and beautiful granite countertops along with stainless steel appliances which opens to the living room.
The lower level of the unit has an additional living room and two bedrooms.
Natural, refinished woodwork graces the apartment throughout.
The unit also has plenty of modern conveniences such as laundry in the unit, gas forced heat, and central air conditioning.
This charming greystone building is nestled on a quiet, tree lined street.
The Addison CTA Brown Line is conveniently located less than one block away.
Wrigley Field and its surrounding bars, restaurants and theaters are within easy reach (eight blocks east).

Other Chicago neighborhoods, full of diverse activities and establishments, are easily accessible via Lincoln Avenue, these include: Lincoln Park, Lakeview, North Center, and Lincoln Square to name a few.
Roscoe Village’s colorful clubs and bars are also just three blocks south.
Parking is available at this location.
We offer a hassle-free full online leasing process featuring online applications, lease signing, and payment options.
Advertised rent prices are subject to change without notice!
